meanings.definition: To reveal or expose something that was previously hidden or secret.
meanings.sent1: I will uncloak the surprise gift for you.
meanings.sent2: The detective will uncloak the true identity of the criminal.
meanings.sent3: When the magician tried to uncloak the rabbit, it turned into a hat!
meanings.sent4: Her smile uncloaked the beauty hidden within her.
meanings.sent5: The sunrise uncloaked the breathtaking view of the mountains.
